name: Blight (itch) (RizingGamesUK)
description:
Find your way through the forest maze, collecting clues to track down the monstrous, infected Cow-dog.

WASD- Move
Move mouse pointer- Rotate
Left Click- Attack/Collect Diamond
Right Click- Back Step
Space- Lay Trap (only at the Boss)

 Berries restore health

Created by:

Adam Butler

Rizing Games 
Cambridge Regional College
